author: James Van Straten
title: Bitcoin Illiquid Supply Climbs to Over 14M BTC, Reflects Strong HODL Trend
description: Over 72 percent of circulating BTC is now illiquid, suggesting reduced sell-side pressure and potential bullish momentum.
content:
Bitcoins 
 illiquid supply has surged to 14.37 million BTC, jumping from 13.9 million BTC at the start of 2025, according to Glassnode data.With bitcoins current circulating supply standing at appro… [+1129 chars]
